resources.string: This app is created to handle different sorts of quizes. For example I created it for myself to solve driving tests. In future it should be able to handle differet quizes with a help of XML files and databases. You this to prepare yourself for exams and stuff like that.
The username, that will be associated with quiz results
The estimated time for a quiz (min)
Set factory settings for current application
Should use timer to limit quiz time?
